Header: Cardinal Meets Bomb Blast Victims in Batticaloa Zion Church
Content: Archbishop of Colombo His Eminence Dr Malcolm Cardinal Ranjith joined an observation visit to the bomb explosion-affected Zion church premises at Batticaloa on Saturday (15). The Cardinal, en route arrived at the SFHQ(E) at first and was warmly welcomed by Major General Aruna Jayasekera, Commander, Security Forces -East and was subsequently accompanied to the Bishop House at Batticaloa. He expressed his deepest condolences to Rt. Rev. Dr. Joseph Ponniah as well as the Head Priest Rev. Roshan Maheshan and other Priests and inspected the ongoing reconstruction work of the church, undertaken by the Sri Lanka Army. Then, His Eminence Malcolm Cardinal Ranjith met several affected families and consoled them before he concluded the tour.
